EmailTemplate.subject: You're Confirmed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-workshop/msp]]> Thank you for registering for the upcoming Cloud Native Workshop in Minneapolis. Please see event details below:
Date: Thursday, October 13, 2016 Time: 11:30 AM - 4:00 PM Location: Butler Square, 100 N 6th St, Minneapolis, MN 55403
{{my.Save the Date}}
Questions? Please contact us <[[mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io]]>.
